definition[0]: a set of leather bands used to control a horse or to attach it to a vehicle it is pulling
definition[1]: a set of bands used to hold someone in a place or to stop them from falling
definition[2]: to control and use the natural force or power of something
example[1]: We can harness the power of the wind to generate electricity.
definition[3]: to fasten two animals together, or to fasten an animal to something using a harness
definition[4]: to put a harness on a horse
definition[5]: to control and use a natural force or peopleâ€™s energy or skills
example[2]: He designs systems to harness the energy of waves to produce electricity.
